decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and hand through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. The goal is to stall the game until the late game where powerful threats like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon can take over. The companion card, Yorion, Sky Nomad, allows for additional value by blinking permanents for extra card advantage or protection. The deck also utilizes the Dimir color combination to access a variety of versatile cards that can deal with a wide range of threats.

Utilize powerful creatures and removal spells to control the board and generate card advantage through Edgewall Innkeeper. Use ramp spells like Cultivate and Beanstalk Giant to accelerate into massive threats like Terror of the Peaks and Genesis Ultimatum. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big plays and maintain control of the game through a mix of efficient removal and card advantage engines. The inclusion of Obosh, the Preypiercer as a companion enhances the deck's ability to deal consistent damage and close out games quickly.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing powerful creatures and ramping up mana quickly. The deck focuses on creating a board presence early on with cards like Gilded Goose and Lovestruck Beast, and then using cards like Feasting Troll King and Wicked Wolf to apply pressure. The inclusion of Ugin, the Spirit Dragon provides a strong late-game finisher option. The deck also includes cards like Trail of Crumbs and The Great Henge to provide card advantage and additional benefits for playing creatures.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with aggressive creatures like Brushfire Elemental and Lovestruck Beast. It aims to play multiple threats early in the game, overwhelming the opponent with efficient creatures and powerful combat tricks like Embercleave. The deck also includes cards like Vivien, Monsters' Advocate and The Great Henge to provide card advantage and additional sources of damage. With a mix of creatures, removal, and pump spells, this deck aims to end the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to maintain control of the game through removal spells, counterspells, and board wipes while generating card advantage and value through cards like Yorion, Sky Nomad, Dance of the Manse, and Doom Foretold. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by continually generating tokens, controlling the board, and recurring threats from the graveyard. It also seeks to disrupt the opponent's game plan through hand disruption and enchantment removal. Overall, the strategy revolves around gaining incremental advantages and overwhelming the opponent with a steady stream of threats and answers.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan by using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalker abilities. The deck aims to maintain control of the board through cards like Extinction Event and Shadows' Verdict while also generating card advantage with Ashiok, Nightmare Muse and Mazemind Tome. With a mix of creature removal, counterspells, and card draw, this deck focuses on outlasting the opponent and eventually overwhelming them with powerful threats like Crawling Barrens or Sea Gate Restoration.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. This is achieved by playing powerful creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Brushfire Elemental, and Lovestruck Beast, while using cards like Embercleave to deal massive damage and finish off your opponent. The deck also includes cards like Vivien, Monsters' Advocate and The Great Henge to provide additional value and card advantage. Overall, the key strategy is to be proactive, apply pressure early on, and close out games swiftly.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing mill effects, removal spells, and counterspells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck focuses on building a strong presence on the battlefield with cards like Thieves' Guild Enforcer and Soaring Thought-Thief while also milling the opponent's library with cards like Ruin Crab. By controlling the tempo of the game and disrupting the opponent's plans, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure a win through card advantage and resource management.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and deal damage quickly. It utilizes cards like Anax, Hardened in the Forge, Bonecrusher Giant, and Robber of the Rich to put pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Embercleave and Torbran, Thane of Red Fell to increase the damage output. With a focus on fast-paced plays and efficient creatures, this deck aims to win the game as quickly as possible by relentlessly attacking the opponent.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive green creatures and using various food-themed cards to ramp up and generate value. The key strategy is to flood the board with strong creatures like Feasting Troll King and Lovestruck Beast, while utilizing cards like Trail of Crumbs and The Great Henge to draw cards and gain life. The deck also has a sacrifice theme with cards like Witch's Oven and Wicked Wolf to control the board and generate additional value. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of strong creatures and efficient card draw.

The deck focuses on establishing control through a combination of board wipes, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers. It aims to control the game by clearing the board, disrupting opponents' strategies, and generating card advantage. The deck also features strong mana ramp and card recursion to ensure consistency and resilience in longer games. Key cards include Garruk, Cursed Huntsman for generating tokens and removal, Ugin, the Spirit Dragon for board control, and multiple versatile spells like Mythos of Nethroi and Erebos's Intervention for flexibility in different matchups.

The deck focuses on using removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It aims to outvalue the opponent by efficiently dealing with threats and drawing cards while using powerful finishers like Ashiok, Nightmare Muse and Shark Typhoon to close out the game. The mix of creature removal, counterspells, and draw spells allows the deck to adapt to different matchups and strategies, ultimately grinding out incremental advantages to secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to provide a consistent source of card advantage and value. It aims to control the board through removal spells like Eliminate and Extinction Event, while also utilizing Doom Foretold to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck has a strong late-game presence with cards like Dance of the Manse and Elspeth Conquers Death, allowing it to outvalue the opponent and grind them out over time. The mana base is designed to support the deck's multicolor requirements and ensure consistent access to all its spells.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on by playing efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Lovestruck Beast, while also generating card advantage with Edgewall Innkeeper. The deck also utilizes powerful finishers like Embercleave and The Great Henge to close out games quickly. Overall, the key strategy of this deck is to maintain board presence, deal damage quickly, and overpower the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The focus of this deck is to maintain control over the game through a combination of powerful removal spells, counterspells, and card draw. The strategy revolves around disrupting your opponent's plans while generating card advantage and potentially creating threats with cards like Ashiok, Nightmare Muse and Shark Typhoon. By managing the board and hand effectively, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through resource management and strategic plays. The mana base is built to support the deck's dual-color needs while providing consistency and flexibility in gameplay.

This Mono Green Aggro deck focuses on quickly playing powerful creatures like Feasting Troll King, Lovestruck Beast, and Wicked Wolf to overwhelm opponents. The deck also includes cards like Gilded Goose and The Great Henge to ramp up mana and draw cards, allowing for a strong late game presence. With a mix of efficient creatures and powerful support cards, this deck aims to maintain board presence and put pressure on opponents from the start of the game.
